mapper.select: select e.employeeID ,e.password ,e.name ,e.status ,e.joinDate ,e.phoneNumber ,e.address, e.remainingAnnualLeave ,d.departmentName ,d.rankLevel ,d.positionLevel from employee e left join departmentChangeLog d on e.employeeID = d.employeeID where e.employeeID= #{param1} and e.password = #{param2};
